mainBoard.flavorText: You know you've ventured too deep when the rats stop running and hold their ground.

Flying
Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: As long as Revenant is in your graveyard, its ability will count itself.
If Revenant is dealt lethal damage at the same time as another creature you control, both die at the same time. The other creature won't die in time to raise Revenant's toughness.
The ability that defines Revenant's power and toughness applies in all zones, not just the battlefield.

foreignData.name: 感情化粧師

foreignData.name: 貌纹绘师
foreignData.text: 朽力～当貌纹绘师进战场时，直到回合结束，目标生物获得威慑异能且得+X/+0，X为你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。（它只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

mainBoard.name: Moodmark Painter
mainBoard.originalText: Undergrowth — When Moodmark Painter enters the battlefield, target creature gains menace and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

rulings.text: Because tokens aren’t cards, they never count for undergrowth abilities.
Creature cards with other types, such as artifact creature cards, count for undergrowth abilities.
If there are no creature cards in your graveyard, the target creature just gains menace until end of turn.
The value of X is determined only as the undergrowth ability resolves. If the number of creature cards in your graveyard changes later in the turn, the target creature is unaffected.

mainBoard.text: Undergrowth — When Moodmark Painter enters, target creature gains menace and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

foreignData.name: Nekrotische Wunde
foreignData.text: Totenwelt — Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält bis zum Ende des Zuges -X/-X, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Kreaturenkarten in deinem Friedhof ist. Falls die Kreatur in diesem Zug sterben würde, schicke sie stattdessen ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: Los asesinos de los Ochran destilan toxinas que vienen de los restos de sus víctimas anteriores.
foreignData.name: Herida necrótica
foreignData.text: Despojos — La criatura objetivo obtiene -X/-X hasta el final del turno, donde X es la cantidad de cartas de criatura en tu cementerio. Si esa criatura fuese a morir este turno, en vez de eso, exíliala.

foreignData.flavorText: Les assassins Ochran distillent des toxines dans les corps de leurs précédentes victimes.
foreignData.name: Blessure nécrotique
foreignData.text: Maquis — Une créature ciblée gagne -X/-X jusqu'à la fin du tour, X étant le nombre de cartes de créature dans votre cimetière. Si cette créature devait mourir ce tour-ci, exilez-la à la place.

foreignData.flavorText: Gli assassini dell'Ochran distillano tossine dai resti delle loro vittime precedenti.
foreignData.name: Ferita Necrotica
foreignData.text: Crescita sotterranea — Una creatura bersaglio prende -X/-X fino alla fine del turno, dove X è il numero di carte creatura nel tuo cimitero. Se quella creatura sta per morire in questo turno, invece esiliala.

foreignData.flavorText: オクランの暗殺者は、前の犠牲者の死骸から毒物を精製する。
foreignData.name: 壊死性の傷
foreignData.text: 宿根 ― クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは－Ｘ/－Ｘの修整を受ける。Ｘはあなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カードの枚数に等しい。このターン、そのクリーチャーが死亡するなら、代わりにそれを追放する。

foreignData.flavorText: 瓯坎的杀手会从他们之前的杀害对象身上提炼毒素。
foreignData.name: 溃疽伤
foreignData.text: 朽力～目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。如果本回合中该生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。

mainBoard.name: Necrotic Wound
mainBoard.originalText: Undergrowth — Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: Because tokens aren’t cards, they never count for undergrowth abilities.
Creature cards with other types, such as artifact creature cards, count for undergrowth abilities.
If you have no creature cards in your graveyard, the target creature gets -0/-0, and it will still be exiled if it would die this turn.
Necrotic Wound’s replacement effect will exile the target creature if it would die this turn for any reason, not just immediately after Necrotic Wound resolves.
The value of X is determined only as the undergrowth ability resolves. If the number of creature cards in your graveyard changes later in the turn, the target creature is unaffected.

mainBoard.text: Undergrowth — Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The distraction of your life has ended. Now your service begins."
—Kalitas, thrall of Ulamog

foreignData.flavorText:
„Dein Leben ist zu Ende. Nun beginnt dein Dienst."
—Kalitas, Ulamogs Knecht
foreignData.name: Leichen aufwühlen
foreignData.text: Du millst drei Karten. Dann kannst du eine Kreaturenkarte aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurückbringen. (Um eine Karte zu millen, lege die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek auf deinen Friedhof.)

foreignData.flavorText:
"La distracción que suponía tu vida ha terminado; ahora comienza tu servicio".
—Kalitas, esclavo de Ulamog
foreignData.name: Agitación cadavérica
foreignData.text: Muele tres cartas, luego puedes regresar una carta de criatura de tu cementerio a tu mano. (Para moler una carta, pon la primera carta de tu biblioteca en tu cementerio.)

foreignData.flavorText:
« Les distractions de la vie sont terminées pour toi. Ton engagement commence. »
—Kalitas, serviteur d'Ulamog
foreignData.name: Barratement cadavérique
foreignData.text: Meulez trois cartes, puis vous pouvez renvoyer une carte de créature depuis votre cimetière dans votre main. (Pour meuler une carte, mettez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque dans votre cimetière.)

foreignData.flavorText:
"La distrazione della vita è terminata. Ora ha inizio il tuo servizio."
—Kalitas, schiavo di Ulamog
foreignData.name: Estrazione di Cadaveri
foreignData.text: Macina tre carte, poi puoi riprendere in mano una carta creatura dal tuo cimitero. (Per macinare una carta, metti nel tuo cimitero la prima carta del tuo grimorio.)

foreignData.flavorText:
「怠惰な人生は終わった。ここからは本気で働いてもらおうか。」
――ウラモグの奴僕、カリタス
foreignData.name: 屍体の攪拌
foreignData.text: カード３枚を切削する。その後、あなたはあなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚をあなたの手札に戻してもよい。（カードを切削するとは、あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカードをあなたの墓地に置くことである。）

foreignData.flavorText:
「你生命已逝，便再无需分神。从现在开始好好为我卖命。」
～钨拉莫鬼卒卡力塔
foreignData.name: 尸体翻搅
foreignData.text: 磨三张牌，然后你可以将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

mainBoard.name: Corpse Churn
mainBoard.originalText: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Because Corpse Churn doesn't target the creature card in your graveyard, you may choose one of the three cards you put there from your library if applicable.

mainBoard.text: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill three cards, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)

foreignData.name: Überbelegter Friedhof
foreignData.text: Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments und falls sich vier oder mehr Kreaturenkarten in deinem Friedhof befinden, kannst du eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurückbringen.

foreignData.name: Cementerio sobrevendido
foreignData.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, si tienes cuatro o más cartas de criatura en tu cementerio, puedes regresar la carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano.

foreignData.name: Cimetière surpeuplé
foreignData.text: Au début de votre entretien, si vous avez au moins quatre cartes de créature dans votre cimetière, vous pouvez renvoyer dans votre main une carte de créature ciblée depuis votre cimetière.

foreignData.name: Cimitero Sovrappopolato
foreignData.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, se hai quattro o più carte creatura nel tuo cimitero, puoi riprendere in mano una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.

foreignData.name: 定員過剰の墓地
foreignData.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたの墓地に４枚以上のクリーチャー・カードがある場合、あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。あなたはそれをあなたの手札に戻してもよい。

foreignData.name: 超卖墓园
foreignData.text: 在你的维持开始时，若你坟墓场中有四张或更多生物牌，则你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

mainBoard.name: Oversold Cemetery
mainBoard.originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: Oversold Cemetery’s ability will check your graveyard as your upkeep begins, before any player has the opportunity to take any actions. If you have fewer than four creature cards in your graveyard at that time, the ability won’t trigger at all. If the ability does trigger, it will check again as it tries to resolve. If you have fewer than four creature cards in your graveyard at that point, the ability won’t have any effect.

mainBoard.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: Beauty appears in strange places for those with eyes to see it.

foreignData.flavorText: Schönheit zeigt sich denen, die sie erkennen können, an merkwürdigen Orten.
foreignData.name: Gedeihendes Moor
foreignData.text:
Das Gedeihende Moor kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie das Gedeihende Moor ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Schwarz.
{T}: Erzeuge {B} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Los que ven la belleza son capaces de vislumbrarla en lugares extraños.
foreignData.name: Páramo floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Páramo floreciente entra al campo de batalla girado.
En cuanto el Páramo floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea negro.
{T}: Agrega {B} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: La beauté perle dans des endroits étranges pour ceux qui peuvent la voir.
foreignData.name: Lande prospère
foreignData.text:
La Lande prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
Au moment où la Lande prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le noir.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: La bellezza si manifesta in luoghi insoliti per chi ha occhi per vederla.
foreignData.name: Landa Florida
foreignData.text:
La Landa Florida entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
Mentre la Landa Florida entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal nero.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 奇妙な場所にも美は存在し、見る目を持つものを楽しませる。
foreignData.name: 興隆する湿地帯
foreignData.text:
興隆する湿地帯はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
興隆する湿地帯が戦場に出るに際し、黒でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{B}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 此地美景尽藏奇异之处，唯眼光独到者方能得见。
foreignData.name: 兴旺湿地
foreignData.text:
兴旺湿地须横置进战场。
于兴旺湿地进战场时，选择一种黑色以外的颜色。
{T}：加{B}或一点所选颜色的法术力。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Moor
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Moor enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Moor enters the battlefield, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
Thriving Moor enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.
